name: vlchristos.com
body:
# Chris Vlachodimitrakos

Hello world, I am Chris Vlachodimitrakos from Athens, Greece. I like coding at the front-end, transforming inspiring ideas into superior user experience.

If you feel like I can do something for your next web project, please [contact](vlchristos@gmail.com) me, as I would love to involve!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
